lectures.note: Welcome to visit all of the companies and organisations on the fair!
A panel of professionals from various roles and organizations will discuss how to secure your first IT position, along with several other relevant topics!

lectures.topic: From Curiosity to Impact: A Personal Journey Through Generative AI and Cybersecurity
lectures.speaker: Vahid Zohali, Managing Director of IBM Sweden
lectures.note: Vahid shares his inspiring journey from early technical curiosity to leading roles at IBM. This lecture explores how generative AI and cybersecurity interact, and how these technologies are shaping the future of work and digital security.
Foo Bar, located on the second floor of DSV, opens! We invite you to share a bite, mingle and unwind after the fair!
